maqras.text: Tag ven when DI testament summon messengers pet them Kiel est response al vi? Ili dir Ni ne hav knowledge! Vi est Knower all sekret

DI testament DIR O Jesus FIL Mary memor My blessings VI your mother Mi supported vi Holy Spirit enable vi parol al popol crib tro adult Mi instru vi scripture wisdom Torah Gospel. Recall ti vi kre el clay shape bird My las tiam blov gxi gxi igx viv bird My las! Vi healed blind leprous My las revived dead My las! Recall mi protekt vi Infan Israel wanted dolor vi profound mirakl vi montr them! disbelievers them dir ‘This est obviously magic
Recall mi inspir discxipl ‘Vi kred en Me My messenger ' Ili dir ‘Ni kred bor witness ni est submitters
Recall ti discxipl dir O Jesus fil Mary can your Lord send us feast cxiel? Li dir Vi reverence DI vi est believers
Ili dir Ni wish mangx el gxi, reassure our kor kon por sure ke vi told us truth! Ni serv witnesses thereof
Dir Jesus fil Mary Our di our Lord send down us feast cxiel! Let gxi bring suficx each cxiu unu de us sign el Vi! Proviz por us; Vi est bon Provider
DI DIR MI SEND GXI down Anyone among vi disbelieves this mi pun him as mi neniam pun anyone aux

DI testament DIR O Jesus FIL Mary did VI dir al POPOL ‘FAR me my mother idols DI? ' LI DIR VI GLOR! Mi ne utter ki est dekstr! Hav mi dir gxi Vi jam kon gxi! Vi kon my thoughts mi ne kon Your thoughts! Vi kon all sekret
Mi told them nur ki Vi komand me dir ‘Vi worship DI my Lord your Lord ' mi est witness them as long as mi viv them. When Vi terminated my life ter Vi igx Watcher them. Vi witness all ajx
Vi pun them ili est Your constituents. Vi forgive them Vi est Almighty Sagx
DI testament PROKLAM This est TAG when truthful VOL SAV their truthfulness. ILI IND GXARDEN FLU streams Ili abide therein forever DI PLACX them ILI PLACX Him! This est greatest triumf
Al DI aparten sovereignty de heavens ter cxio en them Li est Omnipotent
Lauxd est DI kre heavens ter far darkness light those disbelieve en their Lord ad deviate
Li est Unu kre vi kot tiam predetermined your life sxpin life sxpin ke kon nur al Him! Vi ad dub
Li est 1 DI heavens ter. Li kon your sekret your declarations Li kon cxio vi earn
Ne materi ki kind da proof ven them their Lord ili turn el gxi, aversion
Ekde ili rejected truth when gxi ven them ili incurred consequences their heedlessness

Ili ne seg kiel many generaci them ni annihilated Ni establ them ter plur than ni did vi ni dusx them blessings generously ni proviz them flu streams Ni tiam annihilated them their pek ni substituted another generaci their met
Eben ni send them physical libr skrib sur paper, ili tusx gxi their man those disbelieved dir This est ne plur than clever magic
Ili ankaux dir nur angxel ven him! Hav ni send angxel whole materi terminated ili ne long respited
Hav ni send angxel ni send him form hom ni kept them just as konfuz as ili konfuz nun
Messengers vi ridiculed est those mok them sufer consequences de their ridiculing
Dir Roam ter not consequences rejectors
Dir, "Al whom aparten cxio heavens ter? Dir, "Al DI. Li dekret mercy est His atribu! Li surely summon vi all Tag Resurrection est inevitable. Unu perd their anim est those disbelieve
